concept.title: Installation Guide History
concept.shortdesc: This section contains information about changes to the installation documentation in this release.

ul.li: We included content for the new Edge networking mode. For more information, see or (for HA).
We included content for installing and upgrading Eucalyptus to the new OSG architecture. For more information about upgrading Eucalyptus, see .
We deleted the Faststart content. Faststart is now a script. For more information, see .
